node.title: Haunting photographs of Ukrainian refugees
node.description: Photojournalist Peter Turnley spent a week along the Ukraine-Poland border, capturing images of Ukrainians fleeing the Russian invasion.
node.content: ["Photojournalist Peter Turnley, who has witnessed most of the world's major conflicts over the past four decades, spent a week along the Ukrainian-Polish border, and captured these images of refugees as they fled Ukraine.\u00a0"]
